00030 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode OREventCounter::EndRun()
00031 {
00032   string name = fEventCounterDecoder->GetDataObjectPath();
00033   for(size_t i = 0; i < name.size(); i++) {
00034     if(name[i] == ':') name[i] = '_';
00035   }
00036   name += "_Count";
00037   TParameter<int> eventCount(name.c_str(), fEventCount);
00038   eventCount.Write();
00039   return kSuccess;
00040 }
